page.title: 13TRANSPORT FAIRLIGHT E.SUSSEX
page.content:
The Fairlight area, East Sussex is served by Hastings & District Transport Ltd., and most buses travel between Hastings and Rye. There are 9 daily services from Monday to Saturday along the main road, the A.259 from Hastings to Guestling and Rye. There are 4 services on this route on Sundays.
There are 7 daily services from Monday to Saturday along the Fairlight Road from Hastings to Fairlight, Pett and Rye. There are 4 daily services from Hastings to Guestling and Pett, along the Pett Road from Monday to Saturday.
As there are no Sunday services along the Pett or Fairlight Road, villagers and tourists need their own cars, or taxis service, to travel on this day.
